thread.title: Moment topless feminist heckles French far-right leader Marine Le Pen
thread.title_full: Moment topless feminist heckles French far-right leader Marine Le Pen

author: MIchael Howie
title: Moment topless feminist heckles French far-right leader Marine Le Pen
text:
Nicole Scherzinger: ‘Cats got me through split from Lewis Hamilton’ 
France’s far-Right National Front leader Marine Le Pen found herself heckled by a topless feminist at a packed news conference in Paris. 
The protester, from the radical Femen group, managed to chant “Marine, fake feminist” several times before being ejected. 
It was not the first time this has happened to Ms Le Pen, a self-styled feminist herself and the only woman running in the country’s presidential race. 
A group of Femen activists also disrupted a speech of hers in 2015. Femen: Activists protest at the Leader of France's far-right Front National political party. (EPA) 
The press conference was called so she could outline her foreign policies. More about:
